ISTANBUL , May 19 ( Reuters ) - A Turkish court has lifted a travel ban on an Iranian businessman who was held for two months without charge as part of a corruption investigation touching Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan 's inner circle , Hurriyet Daily News website reported .
